text: Hello, is there any way to downgrade the HubSpot CLI version? I'm having problems with version 3.0.12 to create templates.
Same issue here. No issues deploying yesterday, but encountered this error a moment ago
I managed to get it to deploy successfully just now. I was using version 1.4 of the HubSpot CMS Deploy Action; updating to 1.5 in the YAML file solved the issue for me
running `npm install @HubSpot/cli@3.0.11` should downgrade it. if you want to go further back just specify the version number
Thanks <@U02AR9JSW90>! It was a versioning issue for us as well. Referenced the latest `@HubSpot/cli-lib` the HubSpot CMS Deploy Action was using and we were able to fix the issue.
